full_summary:
================================

**Public Solicitation Notice**
-----------------------------

### Policy Area: ICT Services

#### Reference Number: SSC-23-00013248: T

A public solicitation notice was issued by **Shared Services Canada** on April 24, 2023, for the procurement of **ADP Software - Installation** services.

### Tender Details

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Tender Status:** Exired

### Contractors Targeted

The solicitation is open to contractors that can provide services in Canada.

### Contractual Agreement

The contracting entity, Shared Services Canada, is seeking proposals to provide ADP software installation services.

### Evaluation Criteria

Evaluation criteria are outlined in the notice document.

### Contract Period

There is no expected contract start or end date listed in the document.

### Tender Response

The solicitation will close on March 31, 2022, at 2:30 am AST.

### Responses and Attachments

All responses must be submitted electronically. No attachments are required.

### Contact Information

*   **Name:** System (1004), Admin
*   **Phone:** 613 999 9999
*   **Fax:** 613 999 9999
*   **Email:** None
*   **Address:** AAA 123, Fake Street, Ottawa, K1K 1K1, Canada

### Public Solicitation Document

A copy of the solicitation document is attached. Please review the solicitation document for complete details and instructions.

### Note

This notice was originally posted on April 24, 2023. It is no longer active as the deadline for proposals has passed.

Please share this document with potential contractors to help them stay informed! 
Please follow me for future opportunities. Follow the instructions on my bio for support on creating tender-winning responses. Contact me for urgent requests or difficult questions. Please keep your notes up to date regarding government tender notices and projects, and keep connecting with other technical writers who can help each other out with bid writing support.  Send me your job postings so I can help find qualified candidates.  I want to partner with you to deliver consistent procurement support services and references, just shoot me a message. There is much more to share but I have to run now!. Good luck out there, let's make a deal, and have a procurement-friendly day Shahzad!  Best to you and your team! Let me know
